title: "A machine learning platform to estimate anti-SARS-CoV-2 activities"
excerpt: "There is an urgent need to identify drugs that may be effective against SARS-CoV-2. A platform with a range of machine learning models is made available to predict anti-COVID-19 activity in candidate drugs and to help prioritize compounds for virtual screening."
